title: Host a wedding
beginning: If the left 2 timeline schemes are the same color, earn the higher rank
end: Earn the highest green rank in play

title: Privilege
beginning: Appoint 1 Privilege from the bank to the court
end: Draw 1

title: Inherit a title
beginning: Take 5 Privilege from the bank into your hand
end: Put 5 Privilege from the bank face down on your deck

title: Found a secret order
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, revive its time
end: Draw the highest rank dungeon scheme's time

title: Serve as Sheriff
beginning: Put 5 Privilege from the bank face up on your discard
end: Draw the highest time in play

title: Fight for freedom
beginning: Revive your top discard scheme's time
end: Draw 1 for each green dungeon scheme

title: Challenge to a duel
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green or yellow, copy it
end: Copy the lowest rank green dungeon scheme

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
beginning: Copy the lowest rank yellow scheme in play
end: If the highest rank dungeon scheme is green, copy it

title: Declare martial law
beginning: If every scheme in play is red, draw 1 for each player
end: Otherwise, copy the highest rank scheme in play that is not red

title: Arrest your rival
beginning: If the lowest rank dungeon scheme is green, copy it
end: If your top discard scheme is red, copy it again

title: Start a bloodfeud
beginning: If the highest rank scheme in play is red, draw its time
end: Otherwise, copy it

title: Spread the rebellion
beginning: Copy the highest rank yellow scheme in play
end: Copy the highest rank green scheme in play

title: Storm the palace
beginning: Copy the highest rank green dungeon scheme
end: Earn 10 for each dungeon scheme

title: Plunder the enemy
beginning: If there are no red timeline schemes, copy the leftmost timeline scheme
end: If there are no yellow timeline schemes, earn 20 gold

title: Call in allies
beginning: If your top discard scheme is red, draw your entire deck
end: Otherwise, copy it

title: Choose the next Pope
beginning: If your deck or discard is empty, earn 30 gold
end: Put 1 scheme from your hand face down on your deck

title: Evict the tenants
beginning: If your top discard scheme is rank 20 or lower, earn twice its rank
end: If you took gold, put it face down on your deck

title: Collect alms
beginning: If your top discard scheme is yellow, earn its rank
end: Earn the highest yellow rank in play

title: Blackmail her Majesty
beginning: If there is a higher rank scheme in play, earn its rank
end: Earn the rightmost timeline scheme's rank

title: Learn ancient alchemy
beginning: Earn twice your top discard scheme's rank
end: If it is not yellow, appoint it to the court

title: Marry the Duchess
beginning: Pay five times the left timeline scheme's time
end: Earn twice its rank

title: Become a Saint
beginning: If you have 5 or less schemes in hand, revive 5
end: If your discard is empty, draw 5

title: Defeat the church
beginning: Revive until your top discard scheme is red or yellow
end: If your top discard scheme is rank 20 or less, draw 5

title: Declare independence
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, draw 5
end: Otherwise, revive 5

title: Enclose peasant land
beginning: Earn the lowest green rank in play
end: Revive your entire discard

title: Rule alongside your mother
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, revive 5
end: If your discard is not empty, draw 5
